Companies House Signing Status
Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
Your request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) whose registered office address is {!Transaction__c.CompanyAddress1__c} {!Transaction__c.CompanyPostCode__c} has been emailed to the directors and/or anyone authorised to act on their behalf for approval. The request will be deleted if it's not approved and completed by {!Today()+90}. Your reference number for any future enquiries is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}.
View the status of the request for directors to sign.
What happens next
Once the request has been approved by all individuals required, we will email you with instructions for you to review, complete and submit the request.
Contact Centre tel +44 (0)303 1234 500 or email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk.
